data.message: To whom it may (and pretty certainly should) concern: Suppose "burning" questions on selfies do take pride of place, but I would just like to know -- definitively -- and be able to have fixed -- permanently -- why all of a sudden, out of the clear, clear blue, I am now receiving about 15% of my notifications *and* barely a smidge of them from my groups and likes. You've let air out of my balloon this time, facebook, and you're the only one who can put it back (and yes, I've looked all over to find the answer, but the only thing that seems to come up is, it is definitely a facebook glitch and facebook will fix it -- or not -- in its own good time). Signed, a facebook community member, through thick (and presently, sadly) thin...
